title: Update regarding Velocity Motors
story_body:
Velocity Motors (VELO) shares rose 2.5% in after-hours trading at 4:47 PM EST on unsubstantiated market rumors. According to people familiar with the matter, who spoke on the condition of anonymity due to the sensitive nature of the information, there is speculation that Velocity Motors may be the target of a potential acquisition.

These individuals, who have proven to be credible in the past, stressed that the rumors are entirely unconfirmed and should be treated with caution. No specific details regarding the potential acquirer, terms, or timeline were provided.

It is essential to note that Velocity Motors has not issued any statements regarding the rumors, and no official confirmation has been made. As such, the accuracy and validity of the information cannot be verified at this time.

Investors are advised to exercise caution when reacting to unconfirmed market speculation. Further updates will be provided as more information becomes available.
